value.title: Tooltips, tooltips, tooltips in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can display multiple values within a tooltip for a visual. He walks through the DAX measure and also shows some pitfalls to look out for when it comes to filter context.  Go here for the sample DAX statement: https://guyinacube.com/2017/06/tooltips-tooltips-tooltips-power-bi/

value.title: Using different languages with the Power BI site
value.excerpt: I look at how your browser languages affect what is displayed. This all comes down to your browsers and the language settings within. Different browsers are configured differently. value.title: Power BI Drill Through: 5 Different Alternatives That May be Better For You!

value.title: Power BI Financial Dashboard: Frequency x Reach x Yield = Revenue (The F.R.Y. approach)
value.excerpt: Let's do something unique for building a Financial Dashboard using Power BI. We would use the F.R.Y. approach (Frequency, Reach, Yield) to analyze our revenue numbers.  You can also use the F.R.Y. approach to analyze any other performance metric. Leave a comment and let me know how it went for you?
